explains: conj. 以免，避免；唯恐，担心

sentences.en: He gripped his brother's arm lest he be trampled by the mob.
sentences.cn: 他紧抓着他兄弟的胳膊，怕他让暴民踩着。

sentences.en: Prithee master thy tongue, lest we be all beaten till we die!
sentences.cn: 请你管好你的舌头，免得我们都挨打，直到死！

sentences.en: Boil the oil soiled by the coil in the toilet lest it spoils.
sentences.cn: 把被盥洗室里的线圈弄脏的油煮开，以免变质。
